competitors.name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
competitors.notes: Leading cloud infrastructure provider, major competitor in IaaS

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Strong competitor in cloud (Azure), enterprise software, and AI

competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: Competitor in cloud computing, AI, and analytics

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Leading IT consulting, strategy, and digital transformation competitor

competitors.name: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
competitors.notes: Major IT services and consulting competitor

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)
competitors.notes: Newly formed (2015) from HP split, focused on servers, storage, networking

competitors.name: Dell Technologies
competitors.notes: Competitor in hardware infrastructure, servers, and storage

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise software, databases, and cloud

competitors.name: Infosys
competitors.notes: Indian IT services and consulting competitor

context: International Business Machines Corporation is a technology and consulting company focused on hybrid cloud, AI, enterprise software, and consulting. Red Hat acquisition announced. Hybrid cloud strategy.
